a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: DALY rates from schizophrenia by age, World, 1990 to 2019
DALY (Disability-Adjusted Life Year) rates from schizophrenia by age, measured as the number of DALYs per 100,000 individuals. DALYs are
used to measure total burden of disease - both from years of life lost and years lived with a disability. One DALY equals one lost year of
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
